name: Bunny Skating
description:
Try this exciting fun take on the regular running games – skating game where you can enjoy the running game challenges with a better take. For the love of skating, here is an exciting skating game challenge.

The Bunny Skating. It brings together the fun of real-time skating onto your fingertips through your smartphone. It is an amazingly easy to play skating game with really smooth controls where you can skate through challenging obstacles.

The Bunny can perform a lot of tricks on skateboard to score points. While skating, you can collect carrots and trophies to build you collection.

Features:
=======
- There are three different with different easy to hard levels.
- 5 Different characters.
- 4 boost powers.
- Smoothly play.
- Challenging levels.
- Supported IOS11.

So are you ready for play? Download now….
